title: Mixologist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Make a drink with someone at night.

> Give someone a drink you have made.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Whenever you target someone with an ability, you gain a drink depending on their subalignment.

__**List of drinks based on subalignments (subalignments not listed here will give the drink of the closest subalignment listed here):**__

__Investigative:__
> **Truth Serum** - This drink will seek the truth and reveal your target's alignment. (Town, Mafia, Neutral, etc.)

__Protective:__
> **Smoothie** - This smoothie is nice and refreshing. It will heal your target.

__Killing:__
> **Fruit Punch** - This drink will punch your target, dealing a basic attack to them.

__Support:__
> **Party Drink** - This drink will throw a party at your target's house, roleblocking them. Visitors to your target are not invited to the party, and therefore are not roleblocked.

__Power:__
> **Weekly Special** - You may use the ability of another role. (the role does not need to be in the game) (yes the host can deny you from using certain abilities)
